title: Governance State Transition (SST) Proposal Payload
description: The definitive structure required for all inputs to the Governance State Evolution Pipeline (GSEP-C V3.1). Must be validated by PPC (PRE) and SCR (L0).

proposal_id.description: Unique monotonic identifier for the proposal.

target_module.description: The fully qualified path or identifier of the system module intended for modification.

source_hash.description: Provenance hash verifying the source and authorizing agent (Verified by L4: CTAL).

change_manifest.description: A list of atomic changes (code updates, configuration modifications) to be simulated and enacted.

budget_projection.description: Pre-calculated resource allocation requirement (Verified by L3: CMO/CBM).
